message: Water Supply Disruption: Water supply will be interrupted on 15th May 2024 from 10:00 am to 2:00 pm due to maintenance. Please store enough water for your needs.
Power Outage: A power outage is expected on 16th May 2024 from 1:00 pm to 5:00 pm due to maintenance. Please stay informed and take necessary precautions.
Road Closure: Road No. 12 will be closed for maintenance work on 18th May 2024 from 9:00 am to 4:00 pm. Please plan alternative routes.
